title: Missing champ
body: Hi, I rerolled 3 champ shards and I got ekko. But I neither have his shard nor is he showing up in my owned champ lists.

replies.body: It looks like you got that Ekko shard from opening a chest actually, but right after that you turned around and rerolled Ekko, Master Yi, and Mundo and got Olaf from it. You won't see the Ekko shard anymore because you rerolled it.
Oh yes! You are completely right. I confused ekko with olaf. Thanks for the correction!
